definition: لزق laziqa a (لزوق luzūq) to adhere, cling, cleave, stick, (ب to) II to affix, post (هـ s.th.); to stick on, paste on (هـ s.th.); to paste together (هـ s.th.); (eg.) to palm off, foist (هـ ل s.th. on s.o.) IV to Palte on, stick on, affix (هـ s.th.) VIII = I لزق lizq adjoining, adjacent, contiguous │ لزقه lizqahū or بلزقه close to his side, cose by لزق laziq sticky, gluey
